dcterms:description: A dataset for semantic scene understanding of lidar sequences, focusing on the volume of 51.2m ahead of the car, 25.6m to each side and 6.4m in height, discretized into 256×256×32 voxels with 21 classes.
dcterms:title: SemanticKITTI

dcterms:description: A large-scale 3D semantic scene completion benchmark for autonomous driving, providing various datasets for evaluating scene understanding tasks.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:description: A dataset for 3D semantic scene completion, providing a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating algorithms in autonomous driving scenarios.

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for 3D semantic scene completion, aimed at improving the understanding of complex driving environments.
dcterms:title: Waymo Open Dataset

Raoul de Charette
dcterms:description: A dataset for monocular 3D semantic scene completion, focusing on inferring dense 3D voxelized semantic scenes from a single RGB image.
dcterms:title: MonoScene

dcterms:description: A unified occupancy representation for camera-based 3D panoptic segmentation, providing a comprehensive framework for understanding complex scenes.
dcterms:title: PanoOcc
